content:
Hello,
I was testing the guest invite feature on a self hosted install and found when i invite a user and restrict them to a single stream they get both the stream i select, and the general stream.
is this the intended behavior?
when i test it here, i get the single stream i select, as well as the announce stream

in both UI's the "Default" (general or announce) stream isn't available to select or deselect.
but in the self-hosted install, I can generate an invite link which doesn't give the "Default"(general) stream
@Nate W hmm, interesting; that's not the behavior I'd expect. Can you open an issue? I can reproduce at least that #announce isn't listed here, which is a bug.
